page.title: 04Family life - Weekday.
page.content: Our family has five people in it,mother and father and three boys who are 15,12 and 7 years old. Daddy works all day as a joiner.He takes a packed lunch. Me and my brothers go to school and we also take a packed lunch. Mother works every day in a shop.She will be home when I get in from school.We all have tea together at the table.My big brothers have homework to do at night. But two nights a week they go to a sports club in Lancaster for boxing and karate.My mother,dad and me all use weights and an exercise bike in our garage.We all like to keep fit. Dad makes beer and wine in the evening.Mum and dad and me and my brothers play Monopoly and Atara on the computer.We all like to have crumpets and soda pop for supper. I think I am lucky.
